You can file a complaint about any challenge you face in your hostels or institutions and choose to either make it public or open for specific users also,

by choice upload images to backup your complaint if any. Your selected admins can then look into your situation and provide you with a feedback.

If you are not satisfied, you can make the complaint public for everyone to view. Your experience can also contribute to your rating for that particular hostel helping others not go through the same experience.
Thank you for registering as an admin. Your account will be verified and approved within 12 - 24 hours. Kindly check again after the specified period of time. You will be able to log in.
